Contributor: Cofpin, E., artist.; Vincent Brooks Day & Son, lithographer.;
Note: Signed "E. Cofpin." Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says Mother's Day is August 8th. Do not forget. Illustration shows a women reading a letter from her son. The photograph of a uniformed military man is on the table near her. The top of poster shows a military man running with his weapon.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: London : Vincent Brooks Day & Son Ltd.,
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: Women in war -- Great Britain.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; War posters -- Great Britain.;

Title: Mother's Day : August 8
